name: Between Horizons Deluxe
description:
The Between Horizons Deluxe Bundle includes the main game and the official Soundtrack.

Between Horizons
Between Horizons is a narrative 2.5D sci-fi detective adventure. 33 years into the Zephyr's journey, its mission is suddenly jeopardized. Can you find the culprit before it's too late? Experience an enthralling story set in a semi-open world that branches and ends based on your choices.

Between Horizons Soundtrack
Prick up your ears and wrap your head around the atmospheric soundtrack of Between Horizons. Composed by Julian Colbus, the musical creator behind the highly praised Lacuna soundtrack.
